backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the backend, defining data types (Agent, DebateState, UserProfile), pre-populating 9 named agents, and exposing query/update methods for debate management, agent toggling, user profiles, and file registration with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/.env: Local development environment variables setting the backend canister ID and DFX network to local.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment variables setting the backend canister ID and DFX network to the IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS defining Tailwind base styles and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for a neutral grayscale design system with light and dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'The Gang' that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component implementing a three-tab UI (Boardroom, Sensory Cortex, Swarm Health) with push-to-talk and text command input for starting debates, transcript download, and Internet Identity authentication gating.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table component displaying system vitals and per-agent status with enable/disable toggles, memory usage bars, diagnostics modal access, and a Reset Agents button.
frontend/src/components/CrashLogModal.ts: Modal dialog that displays diagnostic telemetry for a selected agent, showing its ID, online/offline status, and a static log indicating zero traps recorded.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Renders the boardroom debate transcript as a scrollable card, parsing speaker lines and displaying them with color-coded badges, a text-to-speech button per message, and an emergency mode indicator.
A destructive button that stops active speech synthesis and calls the backend `abortDebate` mutation to interrupt an ongoing debate.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: A toggle button that starts/stops browser speech recognition and fires a callback with the completed transcript when the user stops talking.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: A file upload UI that accepts drag-and-drop, manual selection, or camera capture, then sends the file to the backend in chunks via the `routeDocument` mutation, tracking upload progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP actor using React Query, reinitializing it when the Internet Identity changes and invalidating dependent queries on actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and identity state persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for all backend interactions including fetching debate status, starting/aborting/clearing debates, routing documents, and managing agent registry and statuses.
React hook wrapping the Web Speech API SpeechRecognition interface, exposing start/stop controls, transcript state, error handling, and a browser-support flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: React hook wrapping the Web Speech Synthesis API with voice loading, British male voice selection, speak/cancel controls, and speaking state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub placeholder for integrating Picovoice Porcupine wake-word detection to automatically trigger speech recognition.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS entry point that imports Tailwind layers and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that mounts the app with React Query and InternetIdentity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility that sanitizes AI response text by stripping HTML table tags and converting plain URLs and Markdown links into styled anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence and hash-cleanup helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration mapping OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extending theme with border radius, shadows, accordion animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration for the React frontend with path aliases, environment variable injection for ICP canister IDs, and a dev-server proxy routing /api to the local DFX replica.
project_state.json: Project state tracker documenting the 10-canister ICP architecture, feature request statuses, known issues, and architectural notes for the multi-agent AI system 'The Gang'.
